name: BOXKILL
description:
Game Jam game, from Ludum Dare 40.

My goal was to create a small gameplay loop that was as fun and addictive as possible.
Game is inspired by the old school flash game called Bubble trouble.

Controls (PC):
Movement - WASD
Shoot Laser - Left Mouse Button

Controls (GAMEPAD):
Movement - Left Stick
Shoot Laster- Right Stick
